-1/4 = -1.00000000000000000000000 X 2E-2

Adding it -1/4 times
    -1.00000000000000000000000 X 2E-2
    -1.00000000000000000000000 X 2E-2
    ---------------------------------
    -10.00000000000000000000000 X 2E-2
    - 1.00000000000000000000000 X 2E-2
    ----------------------------------
    -11.00000000000000000000000 X 2E-2
    - 1.00000000000000000000000 X 2E-2
    ----------------------------------
   -100.00000000000000000000000 X 2E-2

Normalizing result
   -1.0000000000000000000000000 X 2E0

Calculating -1/4 * 4
4 = 100.00000000000000000000000 X 2E0
1.00000000000000000000000 X 2E2

Add exponents
2 - 2 = 0
Both signs opposite. Result negetive
Multiplying significants
    1.00000000000000000000000
  * 1.00000000000000000000000
  ---------------------------
    1.00000000000000000000000

Final answer
 -1.00000000000000000000000 X 2E0

 -1/4 - 1/4 - 1/4 - 1/4 = -1/4 * 4 (they are same)
